thread.title_full: Spectacular - Review of The Inn At The Roman Forum, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Samcat1
title: Spectacular
text:
Once you find the hotel (its location is part of its charm), you'll be absolutely wowed. True to its name, the hotel is near the Forum and Colosseum with easy access to other Rome tourist spots, stores, and restaurants.
It's quiet with a lovely decor. Room and bathroom were both clean and comfortable. However its biggest asset is the entire staff: friendly, caring, tolerant of my bad Italian (!) -- lovely people who want guests to have a terrific visit. Many choices at breakfast ... hot and cold, and eggs cooked to your request.
Absolutely wonderful!
